languages.text: "Память {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} столь же скоротечна, как и ваш век". {n}Ирлиэт склоняет голову, горестно потешаясь над вопросом.{/n} "Твоя предшественница поразила Крударах скверной, неподвластной даже силам предков, единенных с {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контуром Бесконечности{/g}. А пока умирающий мир бился в предсмертной агонии, Темные пленили бежавших Детей Азуриана, отбирая провидцев для безумных экспериментов гемункула".

traits.locale_text: "Память {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} столь же скоротечна, как и ваш век". {n}Ирлиэт склоняет голову, горестно потешаясь над вопросом.{/n} "Твоя предшественница поразила Крударах скверной, неподвластной даже силам предков, единенных с {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контуром Бесконечности{/g}. А пока умирающий мир бился в предсмертной агонии, Темные пленили бежавших Детей Азуриана, отбирая провидцев для безумных экспериментов гемункула".

languages.text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."
languages.original_text: "Память {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} столь же скоротечна, как и ваш век". {n}Ирлиэт склоняет голову, горестно потешаясь над вопросом.{/n} "Твоя предшественница поразила Крударах скверной, неподвластной даже силам предков, единенных с {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Контуром Бесконечности{/g}. А пока умирающий мир бился в предсмертной агонии, Темные пленили бежавших Детей Азуриана, отбирая провидцев для безумных экспериментов гемункула".

traits.locale_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as the time of your lives." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors from the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for Seers to fuel the Haemunculus's insane experiment."

"The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the Dark Ones captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的记忆就像你们的生命一样短暂。”{n}伊莉耶特苦笑着，低下了头。{/n}“你的先祖将腐化带到了克鲁达拉赫，甚至连我们在{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}中的先祖都无法将其击退。当那个垂死的世界在痛苦中挣扎时，我那些黑暗的表亲抓住了逃亡的阿苏焉子嗣，打算寻找其中的先知，完成血伶人的疯狂实验。”
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的记忆就像你们的生命一样短暂。”{n}伊莉耶特苦笑着，低下了头。{/n}“你的先祖将腐化带到了克鲁达拉赫，甚至连我们在{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}中的先祖都无法将其击退。当那个垂死的世界在痛苦中挣扎时，我那些黑暗的表亲抓住了逃亡的阿苏焉子嗣，打算寻找其中的先知，完成血伶人的疯狂实验。”
“{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}的记忆就像你们的生命一样短暂。”{n}伊莉耶特苦笑着，低下了头。{/n}“你的先祖将腐化带到了克鲁达拉赫，甚至连我们在{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}永恒回路{/g}中的先祖都无法将其击退。当那个垂死的世界在痛苦中挣扎时，黑暗之民抓住了逃亡的阿苏焉子嗣，打算寻找其中的先知，完成血伶人的疯狂实验。”

languages.original_text: "The memory of mon-keigh is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the Infinity Circuit to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the Dark Ones captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

languages.text: «La memoria de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} es tan efímera como vuestra esperanza de vida». {n}Yrliet agacha la cabeza con diversión y amargura.{/n} «Tu predecesora extendió en Crudarach una corrupción tan poderosa que ni los ancestros del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} pudieron rechazarla. Y, mientas el mundo moribundo se retorcía de agonía, nuestros primos oscuros capturaron a los hijos de Asuryan que huían, en busca de videntes para el experimento demente del Hemónculo».
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

traits.locale_text: «La memoria de los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} es tan efímera como vuestra esperanza de vida». {n}Yrliet agacha la cabeza con diversión y amargura.{/n} «Tu predecesora extendió en Crudarach una corrupción tan poderosa que ni los ancestros del {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuito Infinito{/g} pudieron rechazarla. Y, mientas el mundo moribundo se retorcía de agonía, nuestros primos oscuros capturaron a los hijos de Asuryan que huían, en busca de videntes para el experimento demente del Hemónculo».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の記憶は、お前の寿命と同じくらい儚い」{n}ユリエットは苦笑いしながら頭を下げた。{/n}「お前の前任者はクルダラに、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}の父祖でさえ撃退できないほど強力な腐敗を吹き込んだ。瀕死の惑星が苦しみにのたうち回る間、闇のいとこたちは逃げ惑うアシュリアンの御子らを捕らえ、ハモンキュラスの狂気の実験の燃料となる予見者を探していたのだ」
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の記憶は、お前の寿命と同じくらい儚い」{n}ユリエットは苦笑いしながら頭を下げた。{/n}「お前の前任者はクルダラに、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}の父祖でさえ撃退できないほど強力な腐敗を吹き込んだ。瀕死の惑星が苦しみにのたうち回る間、闇のいとこたちは逃げ惑うアシュリアンの御子らを捕らえ、ハモンキュラスの狂気の実験の燃料となる予見者を探していたのだ」

「{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}の記憶は、あなたの寿命と同じくらい儚い」{n}ユリエットは苦笑いしながら頭を下げた。{/n}「あなたの前任者はクルダラに、{g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}無限回路{/g}の祖でさえ撃退できないほど強力な腐敗を吹き込んだ。瀕死の世界が苦しみにのたうち回る間、闇の者たちは逃げ惑うアシュリアンの御子らを捕らえ、ハモンキュラスの狂気の実験の燃料となる予見者を探していたのだ」

languages.text: "Das Gedächtnis der {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} ist ebenso kurz wie Eure Lebensspanne." {n}Yrliet lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Euer Vorgänger hat Crudarach mit einer solch starken Verderbtheit getränkt, dass nicht einmal die Ahnen der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} sie aufheben könnten. Und während die sterbende Welt vor Qual und Schmerz um sich schlug, nahmen die dunklen Vettern die fliehenden Kinder von Asuryan gefangen, auf der Suche nach Sehern, um das wahnsinnige Experiment des Haemonculus anzutreiben."
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

Und während die sterbende Welt vor Qual und Schmerz um sich schlug, nahmen die Dunklen die fliehenden Kinder von Asuryan gefangen, auf der Suche nach Sehern, um das wahnsinnige Experiment des Haemonculus anzutreiben."

"Das Gedächtnis der {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} ist ebenso kurz wie Eure Lebensspanne." {n}Yrliet lächelt verbittert.{/n} "Euer Vorgänger hat Crudarach mit einer solch starken Verderbtheit getränkt, dass nicht einmal die Ahnen der {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Unendlichkeitsmatrix{/g} sie aufheben könnten. Und während die sterbende Welt vor Qual und Schmerz um sich schlug, nahmen die Dunklen die fliehenden Kinder von Asuryan gefangen, auf der Suche nach Sehern, um das wahnsinnige Experiment des Haemonculus anzutreiben."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet incline la tête d'un air amusé, mais teinté d'amertume.{/n}« La mémoire des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} est aussi courte que leur vie... Votre prédécesseure a répandu sur Crudarach une corruption si virulente que même les ancêtres du {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} n'ont pas pu l'endiguer. Et pendant que notre monde agonisait, les Drukharis ont capturé les enfants d'Asuryan qui tentaient de fuir, afin de fournir à l'hémoncule les prophètes dont il avait besoin pour son expérience démente. »
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet incline la tête d'un air amusé, mais teinté d'amertume.{/n}« La mémoire des {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} est aussi courte que leur vie... Votre prédécesseure a répandu sur Crudarach une corruption si virulente que même les ancêtres du {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Circuit d'Infinité{/g} n'ont pas pu l'endiguer. Et pendant que notre monde agonisait, les Drukharis ont capturé les enfants d'Asuryan qui tentaient de fuir, afin de fournir à l'hémoncule les prophètes dont il avait besoin pour son expérience démente. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keighlerin{/g} hafızası da tıpkı ömürleri gibi gelip geçiciymiş demek ki." {n}Yrliet, buruk bir keyifle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Selefin, Crudarach'a öylesine güçlü bir yozluk aşıladı ki bunu {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre'nin{/g} ataları bile püskürtemedi. Ölüme mahkûm bu dünya ızdırapla dövünürken kara soydaşlar da kaçan Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı yakaladı. Haimonkulus'un deli işi deneylerine güç katacak medyumların peşindeydiler."
languages.original_text: "The memory of {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} is just as fleeting as your span of life." {n}Yrliet bows her head in bitter amusement.{/n} "Your predecessor infused Crudarach with corruption too strong even for the ancestors of the {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Infinity Circuit{/g} to repel. And while the dying world thrashed in its agony, the dark cousins captured the fleeing Children of Asuryan, looking for seers to fuel the Haemonculus's insane experiment."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Mon-keigh{/g}lerin hafızası da tıpkı yaşamları gibi gelip geçiciymiş demek ki." {n}Yrliet, buruk bir neşeyle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Selefin, Crudarach'a öylesine güçlü bir yozluk aşıladı ki bunu {g|Encyclopedia:InfinityCircuit}Ebedî Devre{/g}'nin ataları bile püskürtemedi. Ölüme mahkûm bu dünya ızdırabına gömülmüşken Karalar da kaçan Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nı yakaladı. Haimonkulus'un deli işi deneylerine güç katacak medyumların peşindeydiler."
